statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureContainerImage)<-[:CONTAINS_IMAGE]-(repo:AzureContainerRepository)<-[:CONTAINS_REPOSITORY]-(r:AzureContainerRegistry)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
